Scroll down until you see stars and then give 5 stars if you liked this app. Also write what you liked." Check for App Updates "After pressing 'PROCEED'you will be taken to the App page.If you see 'UPDATE' button then press it to download latest App version. If you see 'OPEN' button then you already have the latest App version."
